I am very sorry to announce I won‚Äôt be able to play at this year‚Äôs US Open a tournament on which I‚Äôve played 3 consecutive finals in my last participations. I am sure you understand that it is a very tough moment for me since it is a tournament I love and where I have great memories from fans, the night matches, so many things‚Ä¶ Not much more I can do right now, other than accept the situation and, as always in my case, work hard in order to be able to compete at the highest level once I am back.
